bug.author: vapaunic
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Clean up evaluation module in fclib. There are left-over files there from the tsperf days (evaluate, train_util). Move these to contrib directory. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
